title: A commentarie vpon the fiftene Psalmes, called Psalmi graduum, that is, Psalmes of degrees faithfully copied out of the lectures of D. Martin Luther ; very frutefull and comfortable for all Christian afflicted consciences to reade ; translated out of Latine into Englishe by Henry Bull.
author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the Blacke Friers by Ludgate,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
